title: Deploy heart-burst experience at panda-m9z.caffiene.xyz root

requirements.summary: Ensure the heart-burst experience is served at the custom domain root and all assets resolve correctly when deployed to panda-m9z.caffiene.xyz.
acceptanceCriteria: When navigating to https://panda-m9z.caffiene.xyz/, the user sees the heart-burst page (not a blank screen or missing assets).
The heart interaction (tap/click/keyboard) and post-burst message display work the same way on panda-m9z.caffiene.xyz as in the current build.
All static assets load correctly from the deployed location (no 404s due to incorrect base paths).

file_operations.description: Adjust the HTML bootstrapping to be robust for deployment at the custom domain root by ensuring correct base URL handling and avoiding absolute dev-only paths that could cause asset resolution issues in production (e.g., prefer relative module entry reference and/or set an explicit base href for root hosting).

Confirm the React entrypoint reliably mounts the app at the root container for production builds, and that providers do not block rendering of the heart-burst experience when deployed at panda-m9z.caffiene.xyz (no redirect-to-auth or environment-dependent gating).

Verify the heart-burst experience is the root page content (no routing/conditional wrappers that could hide it on initial load) and that deployed-host assumptions (e.g., link building using window.location.hostname) do not break rendering or asset loading on panda-m9z.caffiene.xyz.
